name: copasi
description: Copasi is a Python-based environment for model building, simulation, and analysis that facilitates reproducibility of models in systems and synthetic biology.

frameworks.name: non-spatial continuous framework
frameworks.description: Modelling approach where the quantities of participants are considered continuous, and represented by real values. The associated simulation methods make use of differential equations. The models do not take into account the distribution of the entities and describe only the temporal fluxes.
